feed.title: PeaNUT Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for PeaNUT: v3.2.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • More optimizations by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/93
  • Fixed an issue where test connection would always show success.
  • Fixed an issue where loading screens would use the incorrect theme.
  • Bump actions/setup-node from 4.0.4 to 4.1.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/95

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/compare/v3.2.0...v3.2.1

entry.title: New release for PeaNUT: v3.3.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add versions to API routes by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/97
  • Added /version and /netversion api endpoints
  • Load as Watts by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/98
  • Added ability to click ups load to see current wattage

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/compare/v3.2.1...v3.3.0

entry.title: New release for PeaNUT: v4.0.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • More optimizations by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/99
  • Bump micromatch from 4.0.5 to 4.0.8 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/101
  • Fix theme by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/100
  • Bump @eslint/plugin-kit from 0.2.0 to 0.2.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/103
  • Better login by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/102
  • Bump cross-spawn from 7.0.3 to 7.0.5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/104
  • Settings page by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/106

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/compare/v3.3.0...v4.0.0

entry.title: New release for PeaNUT: v4.0.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • New Crowdin translations by GitHub Action by @github-actions in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/107
  • Fix for empty servers array by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/110

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/compare/v4.0.0...v4.0.1

entry.title: New release for PeaNUT: v4.0.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixed updates not showing in footer

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/compare/v4.0.1...v4.0.2
